Title: Drakeseer
Intro: A Drakeseer is armed with a Sunstaff.

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: This unit’s Dragon is armed with Claws and Fearsome Jaws.

Rules.Name: Dragonfire
Rules.Rule: ABILITIES In your shooting phase, this unit’s Dragon can unleash a blast of dragonfire. When it does so, pick 1 enemy unit within 12" of this unit and visible to it, and roll a dice. On a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

Rules.Name: Flames Of The Phoenix
Rules.Rule: Flames of the Phoenix: Flames of the Phoenix is a spell that has a casting value of 7 and a range of 18". If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster. That unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. Then, roll a dice. On a 1-3 the effect of this spell ends. On a 4+, that unit suffers an additional D3 mortal wounds. Keep rolling in this way until either the effect of the spell ends or the unit is destroyed.
